com.runwayml

Class Runway

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.runwayml.Runway
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RunwayHTTP, RunwayOSC

    public class Runway
extends java.lang.Object
    Base Runway class to be subclassed based on the transport method (e.g. OSC,HTTP,Socket.IO)

    • Method Detail

      • query

        public void query(PImage input)
        send a query to Runway Don't call this on a Runway instace, but a Runway sublcass instead.
        Parameters:
        input - - input image for Runway to query (assumes image is resized/cropped to dimensions set in model)

      • query

        public void query(PImage input,
                  java.lang.String format,
                  java.lang.String key)
        send an image query to Runway with specific format (JPG/PNG) and JSON key to hold the Base64 encoded image Don't call this on a Runway instace, but a Runway sublcass instead.
        Parameters:
        input -
        format -
        key -

      • query

        public void query(java.lang.String input)
        send a query to Runway Don't call this on a Runway instace, but a Runway sublcass instead.
        Parameters:
        input - - JSON formatted input

      • drawPoseNetParts

        public void drawPoseNetParts(JSONObject data,
                             float ellipseSize)
        shorthand for drawing PoseNet parts into the sketch's default graphics buffer
        Parameters:
        data - - the JSONObject received from Runway
        ellipseSize - - how large should joints be rendered
